entry.title: $2300 // Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom in East Harlem with In-Unit Washer & Dryer
entry.content:
Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom with In-Unit Washer/Dryer

- 2 Queen Sized Bedrooms
- Spacious Living Space
- Separate Kitchen w/ Modern Appliances
- Dishwasher
- In-Unit Washer/Dryer
- Marble tiled Bathroom
- Ample Closet Space
- Hardwood Floors
- Near the 6/Q Trains

-Gross rent for this unit is $2,595.00. Landlord is offering two months free on an 18 month lease, amortized over the lease term.

-East Harlem's vibrant roots are depicted through its large-scale murals, discussed in its museums, and revered by its members. Plenty of wonderful bistros, wine bars, and Latin establishments dot the streets. East River Plaza gives you easy access to Costco and Target. Central Park to the west and Marcus Garvey Park to the east offer plenty of green space to relax. The draw of its deep seeded traditions is matched by superb subway and public transportation accessibility.


Great Location! Beautiful Apartment!
Contact me today!

Michaela DeBruhl
Crosstown Apartments
(803) 320-7165
michaela@crosstown.nyc
